name: outlineView(_:draggingSession:willBeginAt:forItems:)
desc: Implement this method know when the given dragging session is about to begin and potentially modify the dragging session.
declaration:
optional func outlineView(_ outlineView: NSOutlineView, 
          draggingSession session: NSDraggingSession, 
              willBeginAt screenPoint: NSPoint, 
                 forItems draggedItems: [Any])
